before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"9q8pq","text":"The antibody mix described in the methods was tested on African green monkey whole blood and BAL fluid. CD56 does not stain AGM NK cells. All antibodies should cross-react with cynomolgus and rhesus macaques but the panel might need to be re-titrated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"aosa1","text":"This is a protocol used to perform immunophenotyping of whole blood (collected in EDTA tubes) or cells from bronchoalveolar lavage (BAL). We have successfully used this protocol for rhesus macaques, cynomolgus macaques, and African green monkeys (although antibody mix provided was titrated on AGM only). It allows the characterization of T cells (CD69/CD25 for activation; CCR7/CD45RA for memory phenotype; α/β  vs γ/δ ), B cells, Monocytes, Neutrophils, Basophils, Eosinophils, an potentially NK cells (CD56 does not work for AGM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcnb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fge38","text":"This protocol was designed to deal with samples coming from containment labs (\u003e CL2) at our facility. If you are using this protocol at a different facility please ensure that proper testing and approvals are in place. The protocol can be used for experiments completed entirely in CL2, simply go from step 17 directly to 31.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"akgib","text":"Put 5 µl of TruStain FcX in FACS tubes (1 tube per sample). {"blocks":[{"key":"brs4r","text":"Tubes can be opened in CL2 (in a BSC) no less than 30 min after the resuspension (step 17).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5f79r","text":"(Samples are generally processed the next day; keep at 4 C overnight, in the dark)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a1u81","text":"Give tubes a quick spin in a tabletop centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"as8j9","text":"Ensure all tubes have at least a few hundred microliters of Cytofix/Cytoperm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
